issue.message: Incorrect formatting string `billing_explanation`; missing conversion character in '`% f`'?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="billing_explanation">This app is 100% free, open-source, without ads and without tracking. You can voluntarily support this project by buying one of the following items. Please note that buying the items doesn\'t unlock anything for you!</string>
implementation("com.android.billingclient:billing-ktx:8.0.0") // inline to avoid fdroid build issue
